title: how do i bind my mastery emote to when i ult?
body:
For example, playing as Cait: When I ult the mastery emote should automatically play.

I've seen Zeds, Zacs, jarvans do this and it looks great flashing your mastery as you ult. If anyone knows how to do this please let me know.

replies.body:
They're likely using a macro to perform both actions simultaneously. Unfortunately, since this would be automating two actions with one key/button, it's not something we support, so I'm unable to assist you in doing this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hey bud,

Hope you have a great Christmas.

I found this resource on reddit where it modified some files instead of using a macro 

https://www.google.ca/amp/s/amp.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3mwvls/how_to_set_your_champion_mastery_emote_to/?client=ms-android-google

Please ensure that changing some text in these files are within the rules as its not using a third party program.

Cheers

I had a pretty chill Christmas, thanks. I hope yours was swell. ^.^

So for manual file modifications, they generally fall under a *gray area*, since it really depends on what specific modifications are being made. I can't specifically give you a green light or a red light here since I'm not on the team that makes or maintains those rules or policies. I can say that we strongly recommend **against** making manual modifications, as they're often done incorrectly and can typically break certain bindings as a result.

Hit me up if you have any other questions.
